Adaptive stress response factors, mediators, and effectors (updated and adapted from Reference [ 143] and authors’ drawings.
17 Adaptive stress response involves activation of intracellular and extracellular signaling pathways and increased expression of antiapoptotic proteins, neuropeptides, antioxidant enzymes, and defense response of an organism resulting in increased survival. One basic mechanism of action of adaptogens, that is, that they activate adaptive cellular stress response pathways in humans’ brain cells [Color figure can be viewed at wileyonlinelibrary.com]
